title: Prepare a Privilege Log
description: After a document review, a litigation paralegal needs to create a privilege log for all documents that were withheld from production based on attorney-client privilege.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all documents tagged as 'Privileged' from the e-discovery platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the list of privileged documents.

tasks.description: For each document, create a log entry that includes the date, author, recipients, a brief non-privileged description, and the specific privilege being asserted.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed log entry for each document without revealing privileged information.

tasks.description: Format the entries into a formal privilege log document for production to the opposing counsel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a properly formatted privilege log.
